column5: I have 15 acres to park/use your Trailer, RV or Camper in east austin. This land can also be used as photoshoot location. On the premise, is a nice barn (Currently NO horses) that can be utilized for photos. The views are spectacular. Sits high on a hill. Gated Entrance. Safe and 15 minutes from downtown Austin. Animals allowed. No actual living quarters in the barn, however able to park RV. Please call or text if you have any questions before reserving.
column8: LAND FOR RV / CAMPERS or PHOTOSHOOT with BARN
